summary: Daedalus was a famous Greek myth character, known for his amazing building and crafting skills. He was like a super-smart inventor! Daedalus created cool things like a wooden cow and a huge maze called the Labyrinth to trap a monster. He also made wings for himself and his son, Icarus, to fly away. But Icarus didn't listen to his dad's advice and flew too high. The sun melted his wings, and he sadly fell down and died.
title: Daedalus
